user_query: I'm planning a family movie night and I want to watch superhero movies. Can you suggest some superhero movies and provide me with a random chuck joke? Also, give me some interesting facts about superheroes and villains.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular superhero movies suitable for family viewing.
Retrieve a random chuck joke to lighten the mood for movie night.
Gather interesting facts about superheroes and villains to enhance the movie night experience.
